Peak Description: Related to contribution of microbial (high) vs terrestrial sources (low)
Related to the degree of humification
Related to autotrophic activity (>1 value indicates recently generated DOM)
Common in situ sensor Ex/Em pair, most closely resembles C peak

Emission: Related with molecular weight and aromaticity
Higher generally related with lower molecular weight DOM
Higher values generally idicated more aromatic, higher molecular weight DOM
Inverseley related with DOM molecular size
